channel.title: Bots on Wolf Suite
channel.description: Recent content in Bots on Wolf Suite

item.title: Wolf Tags
item.description: Storing your information has never been easier. With Wolf Tags, you can store your information bits with ease. Simply use the /createtag command. Made a mistake? Change it. With the /edittag command, you never have to worry about messing up your information. Be assured that only you can modify your tags. Made too many tags? Delete them. With the /deletetag command, you can easily remove any tag you own. You can also delete them as long as you can Manage Messages, making moderation a breeze.
